content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-47.5, -123.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore Pump at position (-47.5, -123.5)
- Boiler at position (-46.5, -119.0)
- Steam Engine at position (-40.5, -113.5)
- Connected via pipes and small electric poles

### Iron Plate Production at Position (9.0, -64.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -76.0) mining iron ore
- Stone Furnace at position (9.0, -64.0)
- Inserter at position (6.5, -60.5) for moving items
- Wooden Chest at position (6.5, -59.5) storing iron plates

### Copper Plate Production at Position (6.0, -62.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (6.0, -62.0)
- Inserter at position (6.5, -60.5) for moving items
- Wooden Chest at position (7.5, -61.5) storing copper plates

### Research Lab
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab with input of automation science packs, positioned within the electricity network

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items without availability
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into an entity.

### Errors related to blocked outputs
- Make sure there is a destination entity or storage available to receive outputs from production entities like drills and furnaces.

### Errors when entities are not connected to power
- Ensure that all electrical entities are connected to a power source and that the power network is functioning properly.

### Errors when entities are out of fuel
- Regularly check and refuel entities like boilers and furnaces to maintain continuous operation.
